org.globalplatform.broker

Interface CDCVMBrokerRequestHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BrokerRequestHandler, javacard.framework.Shareable

    public interface CDCVMBrokerRequestHandler
extends BrokerRequestHandler
    Extension of the BrokerRequestHandler interface including definitions specific to the CDCVM (Consumer Device CVM) use case.

    When invoking this interface, in order to form a valid parameter value the caller shall:

    • For BrokerRequestHandler.initBrokerRequest(short, short, short):
      • For the object parameter, use the encoding rules described for the BrokerListener.onBrokerEvent(short, short, short, short, short, short, short, short, short) for that same parameter. However, the value 'FFFF' does not apply.
      • For the attributes parameter, the value is RFU (i.e. use '0000').
      • For the request parameter, use any of the REQUEST_CDCVM_XXX constants defined by this interface.

    E.g. 

       listener.initBrokerRequest(OBJECT_CDCVM_BIO_FINGER_DEFAULT,(short)0x0000,REQUEST_CDCVM_VERIFY);

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static short REQUEST_CDCVM_VERIFY
      Request to verify a CDCVM value.
      static byte SIO_CDCVM_BROKER_REQUEST_HANDLER

      static short VERIFY_FAILED
      Constant used to indicate CDCVM verification failure.
      static short VERIFY_SUCCEEDED
      Constant used to indicate CDCVM verification success.

      • Fields inherited from interface org.globalplatform.broker.BrokerRequestHandler

        SIO_BROKER_REQUEST_HANDLER

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.globalplatform.broker.BrokerRequestHandler

    • Field Detail

      • SIO_CDCVM_BROKER_REQUEST_HANDLER

        static final byte SIO_CDCVM_BROKER_REQUEST_HANDLER
        Constant used to retrieve an implementation of this interface from an Application (0xC1).

        When using this constant to retrieve a BrokerRequestHandler instance, the caller should explicitly cast the object returned by the Application to the type CDCVMBrokerRequestHandler to ensure it is of the correct type.

        See Also:
        JCSystem.getAppletShareableInterfaceObject(javacard.framework.AID, byte), Constant Field Values

      • REQUEST_CDCVM_VERIFY

        static final short REQUEST_CDCVM_VERIFY
        Request to verify a CDCVM value.

        The BrokerRequestHandler.handleBrokerRequest(byte[], short, short, byte[], short) method shall not write any output data, and shall return VERIFY_SUCCEEDED if the verification succeeded or VERIFY_FAILED if the verification failed.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VERIFY_SUCCEEDED

        static final short VERIFY_SUCCEEDED
        Constant used to indicate CDCVM verification success.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VERIFY_FAILED

        static final short VERIFY_FAILED
        Constant used to indicate CDCVM verification failure.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
